name: Hội An Ancient Town
description: Hội An is a well-preserved ancient town, famous for its traditional wooden houses, winding streets, and rich history.

name: My Son Sanctuary
description: My Son Sanctuary is a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its ancient Cham Hindu temples and historical significance.

name: Cù Lao Chàm
address: Cù Lao Chàm, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Cù Lao Chàm is an archipelago known for its pristine beaches, clear waters, and vibrant coral reefs, ideal for snorkeling and diving.

name: An Bang Beach
address: An Bang Beach, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: An Bang Beach is a beautiful coastal destination with golden sands, clear water, and a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Thanh Hà Pottery Village
description: Thanh Hà Pottery Village is famous for its traditional pottery-making techniques, offering visitors a chance to see artisans at work.

name: Chùa Cầu (Japanese Covered Bridge)
description: Chùa Cầu is a unique Japanese-style bridge in Hội An, symbolizing the town's multicultural heritage.

name: Ba Na Hills
address: Ba Na Hills, Da Nang, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Ba Na Hills is a mountain resort known for its cable car, scenic views, and the famous Golden Bridge held by giant hands.

name: Hòa Phước
description: Hòa Phước is a village known for its ancient tombs and historical relics, offering insight into the region's past.

name: Tam Thanh Mural Village
description: Tam Thanh is a vibrant mural village, known for its colorful wall paintings and community art projects.

name: Núi Cấm (Cấm Mountain)
description: Cấm Mountain is a scenic peak in Quảng Nam, offering panoramic views of the surrounding countryside and a tranquil atmosphere.

name: Khu di tích chiến thắng Đăk Tô
description: The Đăk Tô Victory Monument commemorates the historical battle of the Vietnam War, offering a reflection on the country's past.

name: Làng Chài Cổ
address: Làng Chài Cổ, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Làng Chài Cổ is an ancient fishing village, offering a chance to experience the traditional way of life and local seafood.

name: Tân Lập
description: Tân Lập is a traditional village in Quảng Nam, known for its local handicrafts, agricultural products, and scenic surroundings.

name: Phú Ninh Lake
description: Phú Ninh Lake is a serene lake surrounded by mountains, ideal for boating and enjoying nature.

name: Đảo Bình Minh
address: Đảo Bình Minh, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Bình Minh Island is a peaceful destination known for its beautiful beaches, clear waters, and untouched nature.

name: Hòn Dứa
description: Hòn Dứa is a small island known for its scenic views, coral reefs, and crystal-clear waters, making it a popular spot for diving and snorkeling.

name: Thác Dược Sương
address: Thác Dược Sương, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Thác Dược Sương is a beautiful waterfall surrounded by lush greenery, offering a tranquil escape from the busy city life.

name: Bãi biển Đại Lộc
address: Bãi biển Đại Lộc, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Đại Lộc Beach is a peaceful coastal destination with clear waters, ideal for swimming, fishing, and relaxation.

name: Vịnh An Hòa
address: Vịnh An Hòa, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: An Hòa Bay is a calm and scenic bay known for its untouched beauty, offering an ideal spot for sailing and eco-tourism.

name: Vườn Quốc Gia Bạch Mã
address: Vườn Quốc Gia Bạch Mã, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Bạch Mã National Park is a protected area offering diverse flora and fauna, making it perfect for eco-tourism and hiking.

name: Cảnh Dương Beach
address: Cảnh Dương Beach, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Cảnh Dương Beach is a serene beach ideal for quiet relaxation, offering clear waters and soft sands.
